::Battera::

Her jaw drops at Grimmler's comment.  She blushes and turns away from 
both bots. "The quarters we have will suffice for now."
She was flustered and it showed.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Grimmler::
> 
> Grimmler grins at Battera. "Hey, don't melt yourself, you don't 
have to share 
> quarters if you don't want to."
> 
> He turns around, a smile playing over his lips. "So, are your 
current 
> quarters good or would you like some with two beds?"
